Author: jusoaresf#3291
Content: I am following the guide but ```git clone https://github.com/jl777/komodo``` did not bring that file

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: @jusoaresf my bad. use this

Author: SHossain#0007
Content:
```
git clone https://github.com/jl777/komodo
cd komodo
git checkout jl777
cd src/cc
./makerogue
cd ../../
./zcutil/fetch-params.sh
./zcutil/build.sh -j$(nproc)
```
